Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Relates to calculation of franchise tax on businesses with a business income base over five million dollars
Summary: Provides that the franchise tax on businesses with a business income base over five million dollars shall be nine percent of such income base.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to computation of franchise tax on taxpayers with a business income base exceeding five million dollars
